A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A couple of cool scenes can't save this terrible movie.  Too many plot holes.  (I won't include spoilers).  This movie unravels the saga for no reason\, and the writers pretty much stole the story from 1978's \"Battlestar Galactica\".  I wish there was a way to fix this thing\, but sadly there isn't.  All we can do is pretend that it never happened\, and move on.
